excerpt: With their exceptional low speed performance stepper motors are often a good choice where a servo is required but a gearbox for some reason is not beneficial. With their high pole count stepper motors servos work better with high resolution encoders. TMCS-28 is a low-cost and small-size optical incremental encoder for use with stepper motors and 3-phase PMSM/BLDC motors. It comes with high resolution optical code wheels with a resolution of up to 10K lines.The shaft diameter of TMCS-28-6.35-10000 and TMSC-28-6.35-1024 is 6.35 mm.

Application Notes: Application Note 050 - TMCS-XX Encoder Mounting Manual
